title: Avant Garde Type, where is it?
content:
Hello

I'm looking for projects that Avent Garde is the protagonist;  
Do you know in which posters, cd's, movies, etc.. we can find Avand Garde?

Thanks
author: PLYA

comments.content: I mean at the present time

There's a lot of Avant Garde Gothic around at the moment.

Travis in one band with consistent use of it, including logo

[http://www.recordstore.co.uk/travis/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720140505/http:/www.recordstore.co.uk/travis/ "http://www.recordstore.co.uk/travis/")

This is the latest album

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720140505im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Travis_boy_6337.jpg)

Wow!  
It's great! Thank you very much :))  
I like travis's music! I didn't remember that they had this type jeje

I need to know more examples, could you help me?  
Thank you

mili Thank you very much!  
You are help me a lot!  
I'm studing my third course of graphic design and this last year I'm discovering the world of the types, The tipography is great!  
If there are more examples og Avant Garde and Serif Gothic I would want to know it, only for my curiosity.  
Thank you :)

Here is a Flickr group of designs using Avant Garde:  
 [http://www.flickr.com/groups/393534@N22/pool/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720140505/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/393534@N22/pool/ "http://www.flickr.com/groups/393534@N22/pool/")

It's fantastic! Thanks a lot!!  
Do you know more of that?  
What do you think about this type?

Talk about Rip Van Winkle in reverse! - I've woken up in the 1970's

Nick Cooke

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720140505im_/http:/typophile.com/files/greatchain_6307.jpg)

Edit: whoops, I see you were looking for more contemporary examples than this (1976).

[Some info at the bottom](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720140505/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-avant-garde-gothic/).

Just google "avant garde font" and you'll find all you need, PLYA.
